com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Hs3Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Hs3Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Hs3Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the HS3 bluetooth

    The class provides methods to control HS3 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a HS3 device, you need to call iHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new HS3 device, and then call iHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect HS3 device.

        the construct of Hs3Control.
        Parameters:
        com - a class of communication.
        context - Context.
        deviceMac - valid Bluetooth address(without colon).
        type - type of iHealth device iHealthDevicesManager.TYPE_HS3
        userID - user identify card
        baseCommCallback - communication callback
        insCallback - HS3 device callback
